name: Tameshi
description:
Tameshi is a vertical scrolling retro-style 2D shoot 'em up with colorful pixel-art graphics and an emphasis on manic action.

Engage single-player mode and take on the enemy hoards. Avoid taking fire to build your chain bonus!

Features:

  • Dozens of enemy types
  • 7 stages to conquer
  • 5 difficulty modes
  • Shot, laser and bomb weapons
  • Play with keyboard or gamepad
  • Unique Mini bosses
  • Formidable multi stage bosses
  • Powerful bolt on extras
  • Bullet hell sections
  • Explosions everywhere!
  • Steam cloud saves
